operation.name: Insert
operation.sql: INSERT INTO auth_key_infos (auth_key_id, auth_key_type, perm_auth_key_id, temp_auth_key_id, media_temp_auth_key_id) VALUES (:auth_key_id, :auth_key_type, :perm_auth_key_id, :temp_auth_key_id, :media_temp_auth_key_id)

operation.name: SelectByAuthKeyId
operation.sql: SELECT auth_key_id, auth_key_type, perm_auth_key_id, temp_auth_key_id, media_temp_auth_key_id FROM auth_key_infos WHERE auth_key_id=:auth_key_id LIMIT 1

operation.name: UpdateCustomMap
operation.sql: UPDATE auth_key_infos SET cMap = :cMap WHERE auth_key_id=:auth_key_id
